key.name: floor-z-order
key.description: Mode: 'allow' - Always in front (Overlay). 'partial' - Behind if the focused window is maximized. 'disallow' - Behind if any visible window is maximized.

key.name: dock-z-order
key.description: If true, gnomelets are drawn in front of the dock of "Dash to Dock" or Panel of "Dash to Panel". If false, they are drawn behind.

key.name: dock-support
key.description: Which extension to support for dock interaction.

key.name: gnomelet-type
key.description: The kinds of gnomelet to display. If multiple are selected, they will be chosen randomly.

key.name: gnomelet-count
key.description: The number of gnomelets to spawn.

key.name: gnomelet-scale
key.description: The target height of the gnomelet in pixels.

key.name: reset-trigger
key.description: Toggle this to respawn all gnomelets.

key.name: show-indicator
key.description: Whether to show the indicator in the top panel.

key.name: allow-interaction
key.description: If true, gnomelets can be dragged with the mouse.
